text: For <@U22PWJ41G> and <@ULCSUPTGU> — I’ve tried multiple email addresses, both in incognito mode and not.
Hi Keegan, did you happen to call into support as well? We had an instance of this reported yesterday and am curious if you were able to get the issue resolved.
nope, it actually clones ALL your files/modules/templates that you have modified
Also, I believe client doesnt' get any update notification. They have to check and manually opt-in/install
So to launch a module is better to launch it complete :confused:
You could email your customers letting them know you’ve updated the module and they can redownload it at that point. Better than nothing.
I tweeted at the Hs support twitter bot <@U22PWJ41G>
But that was a few days ago <@U22PWJ41G>
I've tried with a few email addresses at this point so I'd assume it's completely broken and not just a personal issue.
Try it yourself, I dare you ;)
The link I'm using, in case that matters: <https://offers.HubSpot.com/free-marketplace-account#start-selling>
